page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ALLYN
page.content: I wake up.I see what the time is.I go down stairs.I sit and wait till my brother comes down then we decide which video tape we will re-wind and watch.First my sister comes and then my mam comes down and we stop the tape when it is finished.We get up and make the breakfast.I get dressed and play with my he-man figures for an hour then I go and feed my rabbit. I sit and watch tv and play with my cars until lunch-time when I have a cooked dinner.After I go and play with my star wars figures ,I go down stairs and watch the T.V. and play with my cars.Then I go up stairs and play with my action force Figures and with my cars .and then I play hide and seek .After that I go down stairs for my tea . I watch T.V. I eat my supper and say "goodnight".
